title: Michelle Pfeiffer, 61, looks sensational as she arrives at the Maleficent: Mistress of Evil premiere
text:
She's set to star alongside Angelina Jolie in Maleficent: Mistress of Evil.

And Michelle Pfeiffer was on hand to support the Disney film's premiere at the Karo 11 Oktyabr cinema in Moscow on Friday.

The Hollywood icon, 61, put on an androgynous chic display as she stepped out in a dazzling sequined jacket which she wore over a black turtleneck top.

Wow! Michelle Pfeiffer, 61, looked sensational in an androgynous chic ensemble as she arrived in style at the Maleficent: Mistress of Evil premiere in Moscow on Friday

Enhancing her edgy look, Michelle completed her outfit in a pair of flared trousers and boosted her height in a pair of black heels.

Her blonde locks were brushed into glamorous waves that fell elegantly over her shoulders, and she wore a light palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features.

Michelle kept her accessories simple for the red carpet, as she wore a pair of black hoop earrings to complement her attire.

Gorgeous: The Hollywood icon dazzled in a sequined jacket which she wore over a black turtleneck top

Stylish: Enhancing her edgy look, Michelle completed her outfit in a pair of flared trousers and boosted her height in a pair of black heels

Drama: In the film, Maleficent has competition from the neighbouring Queen Ingrith (Michelle) who causes a rift between her and Aurora

Disney beginners may not recall that Maleficent is the evil fairy in the classic 1959 animation Sleeping Beauty, and that Angelina played her in a 2014 live-action film.

Just five years on, Jolie is playing her again in Mistress Of Evil, still wearing black horns, fighting fairies and sorting out her conflicted maternal feelings towards sweet Princess Aurora (Elle Fanning).

This time she has competition from the neighbouring Queen Ingrith (Michelle) who causes a rift between our anti-heroine and Aurora, when her son Prince Phillip returns to the kingdom and proposes to the Princess.

Unbeknown to Aurora, Ingrith is plotting to use their marriage to divide humans and fairies forever, and it is up to Maleficent to try and stop the impending war.

Taking care: Michelle wore a black arm brace on her arm after breaking it when she slipped on wet marble floor during her press tour for the film

Pretty: Michelle's blonde locks were brushed into glamorous waves that fell elegantly over her shoulders, and she wore a light palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features

A vision: Michelle gave a sultry look to the camera as she posed for photos

Chiwetel Ejiofor joins the cast as the leader of an army of fairies just like Maleficent, while Harris will replace Brenton Thwaites as Prince Phillip.

The original 2014 film grossed a whopping $758million worldwide, and brought another success addition to Disney's series of dark fairy tales.

The premiere comes after a source told UsWeekly last week that the actress felt 'pressured' into marrying her estranged husband Brad Pitt. 'She felt that Brad pressured her,' said the source.

Intense storyline: Unbeknown to Aurora, Ingrith is plotting to use their marriage to divide humans and fairies forever, and it is up to Maleficent to try and stop the impending war

Classic: Disney beginners may not recall that Maleficent is the evil fairy in the classic 1959 animation Sleeping Beauty, and that Angelina played her in a 2014 live-action film

Sensational: Poland's Next Top Model star Olga Kleczkowska looked stunning in a black sequinned minidress

Posing up a storm: Olga showed off her modelling prowess in front of a striking backdrop

Their wedding was small and intimate with only their six kids in attendance, though the photos were shared with the world through People.

Their split in 2016 was not amicable with the FBI involved over an alleged physical fight on a private jet. They resolved their custody issues this year.

The Oscar-winning actress has been married a total of three times: To Jonny Lee Miller (1996 until 1999), Billy Bob Thornton (2000 until 2003), then Pitt (2014 to 2016).

Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil will be released on October 18.
